data.title: und Prüftechnik GmbH
data.meta_description: History - D+P Dosier- und Prüftechnik GmbH - Genau Ihre Lösung
data.text:
History

1986 At the beginning of the year Herbert Faaß …

Foundation of the company "D+P, Dosier- und Prüftechnik GmbH"

At the beginning of the year Herbert Faaß founds his company with the name "D+P, Dosier- und Prüftechnik GmbH" as a one-man business. The company's headquarters are rented in Bopfingen-Trochtelfingen.

After only six months, the first employee is hired and a modern CNC milling machine is purchased. The production of complicated parts begins.

1987 Development and patenting of the D+P flow meter SMG ...

Development and patenting of the D+P flow meter SMG

Design and manufacturing at D+P focuses mainly on smaller fixtures, manual workstations and small machines. The first 2-axis CNC-controlled machine with sealant application station is delivered.

The highlight: Only one year after foundation, D+P develops and patents the "flow meter SMG" for monitoring viscous media. Now the rented property can be purchased and thus the company can be expanded.

1988 Development of high pressure barrel pumps…

Development of high pressure barrel pumps

D+P is constantly developing: its own barrel pumps (for conveying greases and pasty media) are manufactured in its own production facilities.

A new office wing extends the company premises.

1990 By now, the company has five employees,...

Constant personnel development

By now, the company has five employees, a solid customer base and positive opportunities for further development.

From this point on, at least one new employee is hired every year, the machinery is constantly expanded and old machines are replaced by new and modern ones.

Also new: D+P has become a training company for skilled workers.

1995 The customer base now also includes major customers…

Company expansion through the construction of a new assembly hall

The customer base now also includes major customers. These appreciate D+P as a specialist for modern and highly complex individual solutions in the field of dosing, testing and assembly technology.

The construction of a new assembly hall expands the capacities.

1996 Looking back at 10 years of D+P…

10 years D+P

Looking back at 10 years of D+P: A medium-sized company has emerged.

Thanks to the dedicated employees, technicians and skilled workers: D+P's excellent reputation precedes itself.

2000 The high quality standard at D+P…

Own quality assurance through certification

according to DIN EN ISO 9001

The high quality standard at D+P receives certification according to DIN EN ISO 9001. As of May, the company introduces its own quality assurance system.

Supraregional further development: Participation in regional trade fairs in Sindelfingen and Sinsheim expands the customer base.

2004 The premises in Trochtelfingen are no longer sufficient…

New building due to company relocation to Nördlingen

The premises in Trochtelfingen are no longer sufficient for the current 24 employees. And the expansion possibilities there are also exhausted. Therefore a modern new building with office building, production and assembly hall is arranged.

With the move to Nördlingen in the Emil-Eigner-Straße, further modernization measures also take place there:

D+P is the second small company in the whole of Germany to introduce the SAP software program.

2006 The 20th anniversary of the company…

20 years of D+P

Award of the Anton Jaumann Innovation Prize

The 20th anniversary of the company takes place.

In honor of this occasion, the company is awarded the "Anton Jaumann Innovation Prize" for its exceptional achievements in flow measurement technology.

2009 From this year on, there is a second managing director...

Tobias Faaß becomes second CEO

From this year on, there is a second managing director besides the founder Herbert Faaß: Tobias Faaß, who has already been working in the company since 2003, supports his father and founder of the company in the management with immediate effect.

2010 The "Automatica" is the world's leading marketplace…

Major trade show appearance at the Automatica in Munich.

The "Automatica" is the world's leading marketplace and the leading trade fair for intelligent automation and robotics. This year, D+P successfully presents its own new developments of dosing technology there.

2011 D+P celebrates its 25th anniversary…

A quarter of a century D+P

D+P celebrates its 25th anniversary!

Within a quarter of a century, D+P has managed to grow into an internationally active and innovative company.

2014 Almost exactly 10 years after the new building…

Addition of office and hall space and

New construction of a production hall

Almost exactly 10 years after the new building and moving into Nördlingen, another extension is necessary. The building is increased by 300 m²; a production hall and a vehicle wing are added.

Currently the company already has 45 employees and 3 trainees.

2015 Expansion of the training focus

Expansion of the training focus

The previous training focus is now being expanded from purely technical professions to include commercial areas.

2016 30 years of D+P - a medium-sized family business…

30 years of D+P - a medium-sized family business

A look back at 30 years of D+P:

A medium-sized family business with over 65 highly qualified employees.

A company full of innovative ideas and a promising future.

2017 A second product area is created: The construction of...

A second product area is created:

The construction of standard cells

The need to work with standard cells has arisen from our daily work.

Therefore, we have developed our own modular construction principle of assembly and palletizing standard cells.

2018 A third product area establishes itself…

2020 Conversion and modernization at D+P...
